entry.title: Pelican Trial
entry.summary:
So i am trying out pelican for the first time here.

I have tried out jekyll earlier using gh-pages and here i am trying out the python equivalent.

Since i was using my windows box this time , there was a bit of tweaking that was needed to eventually get things running.

A detailed step by step guide for running in windows is available here

def python():
    print "Hello World from Pelican"

Hosting is made in github pages which is really cool and interesting.

That's all for now

i pelican
